titleStmt.title: Certain considerations and cautions agreed upon by the ministers of London, Westminster, and within the lines of communication, June 19. 1646. According to which they resolve to put the presbyteriall government in execution, upon the ordinances of Parliament heretofore published. Published by authority.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. and E.M. for Ralph Smith at the sign of the Bible in Cornhill.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
